item.title: Aimee add a quote by Joseph Heller
item.description:
"There was only one catch and that was Catch-22, which specified that a concern for one's safety in the face of dangers that were real and immediate was the process of a rational mind. Orr was crazy and could be grounded. All he had to do was ask; and as soon as he did, he would no longer be crazy and would have to fly more missions. Orr would be crazy to fly more missions and sane if he didn't, but if he was sane he had to fly them. If he flew them he was crazy and didn't have to; but if he didn't want to he was sane and had to. Yossarian was moved very deeply by the absolute simplicity of this clause of Catch-22 and let out a respectful whistle.
"That's some catch, that Catch-22," he observed.
"It's the best there is," Doc Daneeka agreed." -- Joseph Heller

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Marianne Williamson
item.description: "Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, 'Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous?' Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." -- Marianne Williamson

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is hard enough to remember my opinions, without also remembering my reasons for them!" -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "We are all atheists about most of the gods that humanity has ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Rollo May
item.description: "It is an ironic habit of human beings to run faster when they have lost their way." -- Rollo May

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Heath L. Buckmaster
item.description: "Often, it’s not about becoming a new person, but becoming the person you were meant to be, and already are, but don’t know how to be." -- Heath L. Buckmaster

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The easy confidence with which I know another man's religion is folly teaches me to suspect that my own is also." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Nicolas Chamfort
item.description: "A day without laughter is a day wasted." -- Nicolas Chamfort

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Ludwig van Beethoven
item.description: "Music is ... A higher revelation than all Wisdom & Philosophy" -- Ludwig van Beethoven

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "The only escape from the miseries of life are music and cats..." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone you may still exist, but you have ceased to live." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Kevin Smith
item.description:
"BRODIE:
Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned for SEGA." -- Kevin Smith

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "What does your conscience say? — 'You should become the person you are'." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "There are two different types of people in the world, those who want to know, and those who want to believe." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Aimee add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous
